metadata.title: CVE-2017-14729 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The *_get_synthetic_symtab functions in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD)library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, do not ensure aunique PLT entry for a symbol, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ELF file, related toelf32-i386.c and elf64-x86-64.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.30-2ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.30-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30-2ubuntu1').
